web_snippets: Hyrum Lewis is a professor of history at Brigham Young University-Idaho and was previously a visiting scholar at Stanford University.
Hyrum Lewis is a professor at Brigham Young University–Idaho and a co-author of The Myth of Left and Right (Oxford University Press, 2023).
